tasks.task: Attend and experience an event related to the International Year of Pulses
subtasks: Observe and learn about the benefits of pulses
Try pulses as part of the event offerings
Reflect on personal dietary changes inspired by the event

tasks.task: Understand the role of nuclear techniques in pulse cultivation and improvement
subtasks: Recognize mutation breeding as a nuclear technique used in plant breeding
Understand the adaptability, disease resistance, yield, and nutrient content of mutant pulse varieties
Learn how nuclear techniques can identify high-nitrogen-fixing pulse types

tasks.task: Appreciate the contribution of pulses to soil fertility and sustainability
subtasks: Understand the role of pulses in nitrogen fixation
Realize how pulses enhance soil fertility through natural fertilization
Acknowledge the cost savings and sustainability benefits for farmers

tasks.task: Recognize the historical and current significance of pulses
subtasks: Comprehend the recent recognition of pulses' nutritional and soil benefits
View pulses as key crops for sustainable development in the 21st century
